WelcomeSection.title: Welcome To The Yespo App
WelcomeSection.description: We’re glad to have you here! Yespo was created to provide ecommerce stores with a complete toolset for marketing automation. If you have any questions about using our app, our support <supportLink>article</supportLink> covers everything you need. If you still need help, don’t hesitate to email us. Welcome aboard!

UnsupportedMarketsSection.title: Attention!
UnsupportedMarketsSection.description: The app supports only one active market.

AccountConnectionSection.title: Account connection
AccountConnectionSection.connectText: Connect your Yespo account using the <fullAccessLink>Full Access API key</fullAccessLink>. You can find the key in your Yespo account: <apiKeysLink>Yespo API Keys</apiKeysLink>.

WebTrackingSection.title: Web Tracking
WebTrackingSection.description: Web tracking enables to analyse user behavior on your website

DataSyncSection.title: Data Sync
DataSyncSection.description: Data sync allows syncing customers and orders from Shopify with Yespo.

list.first: Once the account is connected, you need to install the scripts. To do this, click the corresponding button and activate the extension for the theme. Be aware if something is wrong with one of the scripts then it will not be installed after the theme extension activation unless the issue is fixed. If something is wrong with both scripts theme extension activation will not be available and won't add any scripts to your theme. The extension needs to be activated only once.
list.second: After the scripts are installed, you can proceed to Yespo for further configuration.
list.third: After the scripts are installed, you can proceed to Yespo for further configuration.
list.more: For more detailed information, follow this <detailedLink>link</detailedLink> or contact <supportLink>Yespo support</supportLink>.

banner.generalScriptError: Something went wrong with the site script. Please, contact support and try again.
banner.generalScriptReady: Site script is ready to be installed. Please, activate the theme extension.
banner.webPushScriptError: Something went wrong with the web push script. Please, contact support and try again.
banner.webPushScriptReady: Web push script is ready to be installed. Please, activate the theme extension.

UsefulLinksSection.title: Useful links
UsefulLinksSection.helpText: Here are some links to help you get up to speed on our software:

links.description: Explore all features of Yespo CDP, including advanced AI features and 9 marketing channels.
links.label: https://yespo.io
